fpmExplorer:Page.title: Analytical List Page
fpmExplorer:Page.introduction: The analytical list page offers a unique way to analyze data step by step from different perspectives, to investigate a root cause through drilldown, and to act on transactional content.

fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.title: Visual Filter
fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.text: The visual filter bar enables end users to select filter values based on measure values in addition to the filters and filter values already selected in the regular filter bar.

fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.title: Bar Chart
fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.text: Use a chart that provides visual representation of analytical data.
